## Breaking Changes

- [ ] None
- [ ] JWT authentication changes (see upgrade guide)
- [ ] Other breaking changes

## Upgrade Instructions

### Framework Update
```bash
composer update progalaxyelabs/stonescriptphp
```

### CLI Tools Update
```bash
php stone upgrade
```

### Migration Required?
- [ ] No migration needed
- [ ] JWT setup required (see [UPGRADE.md](../UPGRADE.md#upgrading-to-v2x-jwt-authentication-changes))
- [ ] Database migration needed
- [ ] Other manual steps (describe below)
